Detailed Description

template<class TYPE>
class gaia::base::Array< TYPE >

Implements array to replace C-style array.

The main templated array class ensuring type safety while making use of ArrayImpl. This is the class users want to use.

 // Creates an array with 50 elements.
 Array<int> ary(50);
 
 // Saves datum into thie array.
 for (size_t = 0; i < 50; i++) {
        ary[i] = i;
 }
 
 // Gets array length
 int length = ary.length();
 
 // Copies from to 
 Array<int> ary2(100);
 ary.arraycopy(ary, 0, ary2, 0, 50);
